name: Singles: A PAIRS Story [DEMO]
description:
Set four years after the events of Pairs...

An Artificial who finds herself having to prove herself in a world set against her kind.

A Venori-born Naian who detects something evil in the wind.

They couldn't have more different backgrounds, but when circumstance traps them on a deserted island, they find themselves having to work together to save the world... and maybe even find something blossoming between them along the way.

Genre.

Sci-Fi, Fantasy, Drama, Romance 

DEMO FEATURES.

  • 6 chapters (3 chapters for each perspective)
  • 22k in words
  • 2 Main Characters
  • Original Art

FULL CREDITS

NOTES:

  • You do NOT have to play PAIRS to understand Singles... but it will definitely enrich the experience!
  • It's called Singles because unlike Pairs, which is about existing couples, these two characters have no past history.
  • The demo covers both perspectives up to their very first meeting, meaning it does not actually cover the island bits yet. Sorry about that.
  • Projected release is next month!

Questions You Can Answer If You Want:

1. Which character appealed most to you (either in appearance or personality)?
2. What do you think the black flowers are?
3. Did you play the first Pairs game? If so,  did you like the cameos?
4. Any questions or commentary?
